title: A Busy Wargaming SUMMER Ahead - The Every Other Sunday Show
description:
Spring is here and I'm enjoying it, but I just realized how much wargaming stuff will happen this summer! New releases, new projects, traveling to conventions - all kinds of things. We'll talk about what's to come, and of course, I'll answer your wargaming-related questions. Come have fun!

Vince Venturella and I made a game! Check out Reign in Hell - Demonic Skirmish Combat at http://www.reigninhellgame.com

I'm now a partner on Twitch! I paint minis every Friday morning and Monday night, and sometimes take paint breaks (play video games poorly). Follow me: http://www.twitch.tv/tabletopminions

Official Tabletop Minions t-shirts: http://bit.ly/merchbunker

Help support the channel on Patreon, and get access to the Discord: http://www.patreon.com/tabletopminions

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/tabletopminions
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/tabletopminions
